member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.JavascriptAction.Options
member.summary: Gets or sets configurable options for the dialog.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.JavascriptAction.Disabled
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional expression which if is true will disable this action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.JavascriptAction.ResultProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets the property path to store the dialog result in.
member.value: The property path to store the dialog result in.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.MultiplyDialog
member.summary: Custom command which takes takes 2 data bound arguments (arg1 and arg2) and multiplies them returning that as a databound result.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.MultiplyDialog.Arg1
member.summary: Gets or sets memory path to bind to arg1 (ex: conversation.width).
member.value: Memory path to bind to arg1 (ex: conversation.width).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.MultiplyDialog.Arg2
member.summary: Gets or sets memory path to bind to arg2 (ex: conversation.height).
member.value: Memory path to bind to arg2 (ex: conversation.height).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.TestBot.Json.MultiplyDialog.ResultProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets caller's memory path to store the result of this step in (ex: conversation.area).
member.value: Caller's memory path to store the result of this step in (ex: conversation.area).
